amendment.description: Grassley Amendment No. 2899 (to Amendment No. 2898), relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2899 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2899 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2898. (consideration: CR S2958; text: CR S2958) Grassley Amendment No. 2899 (to Amendment No. 2898), relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2899 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 2898.
